messages.message: I have a PR with jenkins tests that consistently terminate/time out with the `Sending interrupt signal to process` message. It happens during unit testing, but running `make test` on relevant folders in the terminal succeeds fine, any tips?
are you still blocked on this?

Other folks on my team are also still seeing slowness and timeouts.

<!subteam^S038TM462UX> can we take this up with priority. This is impacting all the engineers if we can’t run CI tests.
ah ya, still havent gotten a successful jenkins run
ping on this? i’m blocked on all of my PRs, and all the PRs I’ve been reviewing have also been blocked on this

Releng team hasn't change anything there.  We've traced down all changes on infra side and revert them back.
It is very likely some bad code got merged in that cause significant performance regression.
Having said that, we are digging into it to root cause.
anybody knows about the loadgen test? what does that test do and how is it launched?
That’d be @shikhar but he’s in india time. Can we remove that test for now? It is a separate job?
Let’s remove the loadgen test if it is causing any issues
Sorry I am not saying it is the issue, was just looking into it and trying to get some understanding
cool cool :slightly_smiling_face: understood.  I think most of the people are in IST right now.
Is it generating a lot of load on the Jenkins hosts?

also when reporting such failure, can we also post the CI job link as well? otherwise it is almost impossible for us to go through all of the PRs one by one to investigate, some of those runs are actual code errors cause the PR themselves
ah ya ofc, I can add mine (https://jenkins.instabase.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/instabase/detail/PR-37049/15/pipeline)
@shiqi I think we need to increase timeout thresholld in CI pipeline to at least unblock PRs.

Hi team, can you give a ping here when you figure out the root cause? i'm planning to pull 23.04 into the aihub branch tomorrow / Saturday morning ET; but i want to wait on this before pulling. Thank you.
Yup we will ping you once it’s resolved
Quick review to remove loadgen tests? https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/39581
